id: Webinar and CEU Tracker in Notion
name: Webinar and CEU Tracker in Notion
description: Webinar and CEU tracker template makes it easy to keep track of thewebinars you have showed interest in.Get reminder updates before a webinar startsKeep track of meeting ID links and URLsKeep track of CEUsKeep copies of confirmations and certificatesKeep all webinar downloadable materials and notes in one organized locationIncludes webinar note template for each new webinarHave peace of mind that you will never miss another webinar!
features: Get reminder updates before a webinar starts; Keep track of meeting ID links and URLs; Keep track of CEUs; Keep copies of confirmations and certificates; Keep all webinar downloadable materials and notes in one organized location; Includes webinar note template for each new webinar
